title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
description: Column icons are not visible when attempting to connect to a Derby database.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not displayed as expected.
EB: Upon connecting to a Derby database, the column icons should be visible and properly displayed.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Database' tab.
3. Click on 'Connect' for a Derby database.
4. Observe the column icons in the connected database.
